amendment.description: Page 160, line 2, strike "and" and after such line insert the following: (5) by redesignating subsection (f) as subsection (g) and inserting after subsection (e) the following: "(f) Reduction of Amounts Authorized to Be Appropriated for Late Reporting-***.
amendment.purpose: Page 160, line 2, strike "and" and after such line insert the following: (5) by redesignating subsection (f) as subsection (g) and inserting after subsection (e) the following: "(f) Reduction of Amounts Authorized to Be Appropriated for Late Reporting-***.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Garrett amendment (A005) Agreed to by voice vote.
